page.title: 06LOCAL INDUSTRY.
page.content: My dad and uncle run a garage in Jemimaville. They do repairs on all vehicles like cars, lorries, buses, tractors and other things. The garage is just opposite the road up to Udale. The garage was first a sawmill then a church then it was converted into a garage. My granda built it a long time ago. It has two ramps, two offices only one of which is in use, a work bench, a machine for taking wheels off cars, lots of tools and two tops of container lorries for store rooms. My dad and uncle are the only people who work there but they used to have another worker called Mackie but he broke his leg and couldn't come to work in the garage again. We sell petrol and diesel there too . Their main suppliers for spare parts are MacRae & Dick's firm in Inverness. cont. on page 7
